import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import { UserContext } from "./components/Root"; function Nav({ toggleCart, signout }) { const loggedIn = useContext(UserContext); return (
HOME STORE ARTISTS DISCOGRAPHY PLAYLISTS ABOUT STEM PLAYER {loggedIn ? ( <> LOGOUT ) : ( )}
); } export default Nav;
